alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:04PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Phillips, Petroleum, southwestern Garfield and western Valley Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 803 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers with isolated thunderstorms near Fourchette, or 23 miles east of Zortman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winnett, Zortman, Sand Springs, Fourchette, U L Bend Rec Area, Crooked Creek Rec Area, Flatwillow, Devils Creek Rec Area, Edwards, Mosby, Petrolia Lake, Fred Robinson Bridge, Steve Fork, Tiegen, Landusky, Content, Sun Prairie, Valentine and Cat Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips
